Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Editor of the Proceedings of the 9th international Symposium on Imprecise Probability: Theories and Applications 20-24 July 2015, Pescara, Italy ( with T. Augustin, E. Miranda, E. Quaeghebeur), Aracne Editrice.
Editor of the Special Issue ISIPTA15, International Journal of Approximate Reasoning, Elsevier (with T. Augustin, M. Marinacci).

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Workshop: Models for Handling Partial Knowledge in Artificial Intelligence Ettore Majorana Centre for Scientific Culture, Erice 19-25 June 1994.
Workshop: Wupes’94, Trest, Prague, September 1994.
International symposium on hyperstructures and their applications in criptography, geometry and probability, Pescara 29 settembre-2 October 1995.
Convegno L’analisi dell’incertezza della gestione dell’economia e del territorio, Benevento 3-4 May 1996.
Workshop: Partial knowledge and uncertainty in complex systems, Roma. 16-18 May 1996.
Workshop: Conditioning and inference in intelligent systems, Ettore Majorana Centre for Scientific Culture, Erice 8-15 April 1997.
Giornate di geometrie combinatorie, Roma 29-30 May 1997.
Convegno Metodi di rappresentazione dell’incertezza nell’architettura, Pescara, 27-30 November 1997
Convegno Nazionale Mathesis, L’Aquila 19-21-October 1998.
I Convegno del progetto di Ricerca cofinanziato MURST Modelli per il trattamento della conoscenza parziale nel processo decisionale, Perugia 7-9 April 1999.
Convegno Evoluzioni della matematica, delle sue applicazioni e del suo insegnamento, Numana 4-10 June 1999.
Workshop on Conditional Independence Structures and Graphical Models, Toronto, Canada. 27 September - 1 October 1999.
Workshop on Partial Knowledge and uncertainty: independence, conditioning inference, Roma 4-6 May 2000.
II Convegno del progetto di Ricerca cofinanziato MURST Modelli per il trattamento della conoscenza parziale nel processo decisionale, Lipari, Sicily, 22-26 July 2000.
Convegno Intermedio SIS Processi e Metodi Statistici di Valutazione, Roma 4-6 June 2001.
Second International Symposium on Imprecise Probabilities and Their Applications, Ithaca New York, 26-29 June 2001.
Third International Symposium on Imprecise Probabilities and Their Applications, Lugano, Switzerland, 14-17 July 2003.
8th International Congress on Insurance: Mathematics & Economics, June 2004 Rome.
Convegno MTISD’04 Metodi, Modelli e Tecnologie dell’Informazione a Supporto delle Decisioni, Facolta’ di Scienze Economiche e Sociali, Benevento 24-26 Giugno 2004.
Convegno MTISD’06 Metodi, Modelli e Tecnologie dell’Informazione a Supporto delle Decisioni, Università degli Studi di Napoli – L’Orientale, Procida 28-30 Settembre 2006.
Fifth International Symposium on Imprecise Probability: Theories and Applications (ISIPTA ’07) Prague, Czech Republic, 16-19 July 2007.
Convegno MITSD'10 Metodi, Modelli e Tecnologie dell'Informazione a Supporto delle Decisioni, Universita' G. d'Annunzio Chieti- Pescara
Organizer of the Fifth SIPTA Summer School on Imprecise Probability: Theories and Applications, Pescara, July 16-20, 2012.
Organizer of the Ninth Symposium on Imprecise Probability: Theories and Applications, ISIPTA’15, Pescara, July 20-24, 2015.

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Membro di SIPTA (International Society for Imprecise Probability: Theories and Applications).
Membro del Program Committee of the Forth International Symposium on Imprecise Probability: Theories and Applications (ISIPTA ’05), Carnegie Mellon University, Pittsburgh, PA, USA, July 20-23, 2005.
Membro del Program Committee of the Fifth International Symposium on Imprecise Probability: Theories and Applications (ISIPTA ’07), Prague, Czech Republic, July 16-19, 2007.
Membro del Executive Committee di SIPTA (14 July 2009 – 24 July 2011).
Membro del Program Committee of the Sixth International Symposium on Imprecise Probability: Theories and Applications (ISIPTA ’09), Durham, UK, July 14-16, 2009.
Membro del Program Committee of the Seventh International Symposium on Imprecise Probability: Theories and Applications (ISIPTA ’11), Innsbruck, Austria, July 25-28, 2011.
Membro del Committee for IJAR Young Researcher Award, Seventh International Symposium on Imprecise Probability: Theories and Applications, Innsbruck, Austria, July 25-28, 2011.
